HomePage.pageDescription: Portfolio of Yuta Asakura, a full-stack web developer.
HomePage.pageKeywords: Yuta Asakura, Web Developer, Full-Stack, Portfolio
HomePage.ogDescription: Explore the portfolio of Yuta Asakura, showcasing web development projects.
HomePage.twitterDescription: Portfolio of Yuta Asakura, showcasing web development projects.
HomePage.projectsDescription: Here’s a look at some of my recent projects. As a full-stack web developer, I focus on building clean, responsive, and high-performing applications. Each project is a chance to refine my skills, whether I’m optimizing performance, enhancing user experience, or implementing the latest technologies. From concept to deployment, I ensure every detail is carefully crafted to deliver seamless functionality and a polished design. My passion for coding and problem-solving drives me to keep learning and adapting, making sure that every project I work on is modern, efficient, and built for real-world impact.

AboutMe.aboutMeDescription: Before transitioning into tech, I spent 8 years in the construction industry as a construction foreman. These experiences shaped my ability to lead teams, solve problems, and focus on delivering high-quality results, all of which I now apply to my work as a full-stack web developer. Shortly after I graduated from Le Wagon Tokyo’s full-time full-stack web development bootcamp, where I honed my skills in web development, I joined Tierline Inc. as a full-stack web developer. I’m driven by a love for learning and the endless pursuit of knowledge, as I believe it brings purpose to everything I do. I aim to build seamless, efficient web applications that enhance user experience while meeting business goals, working closely with teams to deliver reliable, scalable solutions. I also look forward to one day mentoring other aspiring developers. I have a particular interest in JavaScript, Vue.js, React, and in my free time, I enjoy bouldering, skateboarding, bodybuilding, and practicing yoga.

ContactPage.introParagraph: Looking for a reliable, professional full-stack web developer for your website or web application projects? Or perhaps you’d like to connect and collaborate on an exciting project? Feel free to reach out and let me know how I can assist you. I’d love to help!
ContactPage.connectParagraph: Interested in collaborating on a project, freelance/contract work, or looking to hire a professional full-stack web developer and designer? If you have suggestions about my projects or portfolio, or simply want to connect, feel free to reach out by sending me a message through the contact form. I’d be happy to hear from you!
ContactPage.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
ContactPage.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

description: Developed and deployed scalable web applications using React, Spring Boot, and MySQL, improving performance and user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features based on client requirements.
Played a key role in a team that created and implemented a web-based employee management system for our company, built using Java Spring Boot, Typescript, React, and Tailwind CSS.

positions.title: Construction Foreman
description: Supervised construction projects and managed a team of scaffolders.

positions.title: Construction Worker (Scaffolder)
description: Worked on various construction projects as a scaffolder.

DataArray.title: AI powered CRM-like tool
DataArray.name: Personal Relations Manager
DataArray.description: Personal Relationship Manager is an open source mobile AI powered CRM-like tool aimed at individual mobile users who want to further their career. This Application was developed as part of a 2 week challenge from inception to completition as part of the Tokyo Le Wagon bootcamp.
DataArray.additionalDescription: Login Credentials for the live demo: user: admin@admin.com pw: adminadmin

DataArray.title: Trello-inspired task management app built with Vue.js and TypeScript
DataArray.name: Veullo: Task Management App
DataArray.description: This is a Trello-inspired task management app built with Vue.js and TypeScript. Using Vite as the build tool, and deployed on Vercel for fast and reliable hosting, the app allows users to organize tasks into customizable lists, such as 'To Do', 'In Progress', and 'Done'. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks and lists with ease, utilizing features like drag-and-drop reordering, custom list colors, a light/dark mode toggle, fuzzy search, and persistent data in local storage. These features make task management intuitive and visually appealing.

DataArray.title: Simplified setting page built with Vue.js and TypeScript
DataArray.name: Vue TS Simplified Settings Page
DataArray.description: This project is built using Vue.js with TypeScript and focuses on creating a simplified settings page using advanced Vue features like Teleport, KeepAlive, and shared state management. The project is styled using Tailwind CSS for a responsive and modern design.

DataArray.title: Event Booking Manager built with Vue.js powered by Ticketmaster API
DataArray.name: Vue Event Booking Manager
DataArray.description: The Vue Event Booking Manager is a Vue.js fictional personal booking manager web application that allows users to browse available events coming from the Ticketmaster Discovery API and manage their bookings. It provides a simple interface where users can register for events, view their bookings, and cancel bookings as needed.

DataArray.title: Desktop first fully responsive MPA
DataArray.name: Code and Create
DataArray.description: This project is a fully responsive, multi-page web app created using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. It features a modern design with dynamic content and advanced CSS techniques, enhancing both the look and functionality of the site.

DataArray.title: Fully responsive website
DataArray.name: Omnifood Project
DataArray.description: Omnifood is a fictional company specializing in AI-based meal subscriptions, and this single-page website highlights both responsive design and advanced CSS techniques.

DataArray.title: Fictional real estate website
DataArray.name: Nexter Project
DataArray.description: Nexter is a fictional real estate website designed to showcase luxurious homes and provide users with a seamless home-buying experience. This project demonstrates advanced CSS Grid and SCSS techniques, resulting in a fully responsive layout with rich features and an elegant design.

DataArray.title: Fictional tour company website
DataArray.name: Natours Project
DataArray.description: Natours is a fictional tour company website designed to inspire people to explore the natural world through exciting adventures. This project is built using advanced SCSS techniques, showcasing features like animations, color management, responsive design with Sass mixins, and modern web design practices.
